<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Restorative Moment](/Spells.aspx?ID=805)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 239 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Renewal](/Lessons.aspx?ID=10)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You manipulate the threads of time around the target, giving them some of the benefits of a day's passage. The target decreases the values of any [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) and [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) conditions it has by 1 and can immediately attempt one saving throw against each affliction it has with a stage length of 1 day or less. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 day.
name: Restorative Moment
